name: Chuza!
description:
Bowl a perfect strike in 360º with Chuza!

Can you knock down all the pins before the time runs out?

Features:
  • Tilt your device to move the bowling ball around and knock down the pins.
  • Make a spare to find bombs and explode those pins!
  • Infinite and increasing difficulty levels.
  • Challenge your Facebook friends for the best score on the leaderboard.

Chuza! reached positions 87 and 193 in the Top Free Sports and Arcade Games in the iTunes App Store Mexico, in August, 2014.

Enjoy and leave a comment!

Scan and download! Like on Facebook
